mapper.select: select p.permission_value from acl_user_role ur inner join acl_role_permission rp on rp.role_id = ur.role_id inner join acl_permission p on p.id = rp.permission_id where ur.user_id = #{id} and p.type = 2 and ur.is_deleted = 0 and rp.is_deleted = 0 and p.is_deleted = 0
select permission_value from acl_permission where type = 2 and is_deleted = 0

SELECT ap.id AS id, ap.pid AS pid, ap.name AS name, ap.type AS type, ap.permission_value AS permissionValue, ap.path AS path, ap.component AS component, ap.icon AS icon, ap.`status` AS `status` FROM acl_permission ap LEFT JOIN acl_role_permission arp ON arp.permission_id = ap.id WHERE arp.role_id = #{id} and arp.is_deleted = 0

SELECT ap.id AS id, ap.pid AS pid, ap.name AS name, ap.type AS type, ap.permission_value AS permissionValue, ap.path AS path, ap.component AS component, ap.icon AS icon, ap.`status` AS `status` FROM acl_permission ap LEFT JOIN acl_role_permission arp ON arp.permission_id = ap.id WHERE arp.role_id = (select aur.role_id from acl_user_role aur left join acl_user au on au.id = aur.user_id where au.id = #{id} and au.is_deleted = 0 and aur.is_deleted = 0) and ap.is_deleted = 0 and arp.is_deleted = 0
